text: Joseph Clois Shivers, Jr. (November 29, 1920 â€“ September 1, 2014) was an American textile chemist. He was from West Chester, Pennsylvania. Shivers was best known for developing Spandex. On September 1, 2014, Shivers died in Venice, Florida, aged 93. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American chemists Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:Scientists from Pennsylvania
title: Joseph Shivers
